name: Kayaking
about: Scenic routes, trained guides, and safety briefing. Minimum age 10.
description: Curated small-group experience. Certified guide. Safety first with gear included. Helmet and life jackets along with an expert will accompany in kayaking.

name: Paragliding
about: Soar above the Himalayas with India's top-rated paragliding site.
description: Certified pilots ensure a safe and thrilling experience. Includes pre-flight training, photos, and videos of your flight.

name: Scuba Diving
about: Dive into turquoise waters and explore marine life up close.
description: Beginners welcome. Includes equipment, instructor, and underwater photography. Dive up to 10 meters deep.

name: Desert Safari
about: Golden dunes, camel rides, and sunset dinners.
description: Includes camel ride, jeep adventure, and evening cultural show with dinner under the stars.

name: River Rafting
about: Adrenaline-pumping rapids on the Ganges river.
description: Certified instructors with safety gear and briefing. Includes 16 km rafting and cliff jump opportunity.

name: Trekking to Triund
about: Panoramic views of Dhauladhar ranges and easy climb.
description: Guided trek including camping, bonfire, and meals. Perfect for beginners and families.

name: Hot Air Balloon Ride
about: Bird’s eye view of the pink city with sunrise glow.
description: 30-minute ride with expert pilot. Includes refreshments and souvenir certificate.

name: Snow Skiing
about: Glide through powder snow with certified trainers.
description: Includes skis, boots, and training session. Great for beginners and pros alike.

name: Backwater Houseboat Stay
about: Traditional houseboat cruise through scenic backwaters.
description: Private boat with meals included. Enjoy the calm lagoons and village life along the way.

name: Caving Adventure
about: Explore India’s longest natural caves with expert guides.
description: Includes headlamps, helmets, and guide support. Not for claustrophobic individuals.

name: Bungee Jumping
about: India’s highest fixed platform bungee jump.
description: Safety-certified setup with trained jump masters. Get your jump certificate and GoPro video.

name: Ziplining
about: Fly over valleys and forests with thrilling zip lines.
description: Helmet, harness, and gloves provided. Safe for all above age 12.

name: Coffee Plantation Tour
about: Aromatic trails through lush coffee estates.
description: Guided walk with tasting session. Learn about bean-to-cup journey of Indian coffee.

name: Cycling Tour
about: Leisure ride through colonial streets and seaside paths.
description: Includes bicycle, helmet, and guide. Refreshments provided mid-way.

name: Wildlife Safari
about: Witness tigers and elephants in their natural habitat.
description: 4-hour jeep safari with naturalist guide. Includes park entry fees and refreshments.

name: Rock Climbing
about: Climb historic sandstone cliffs with expert supervision.
description: Includes gear, shoes, chalk, and trainer support. Multiple routes for all levels.
